member.name: M:XmlUtilityCLR.SerializationManager`1.Save(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Serializes the current as XML, to the specified , using the default encoding and buffer size. If the file exists, it can be either overwritten or appended to. If the file does not exist, this constructor creates a new file.
member.param: The complete file path to write to.

Determines whether data is to be appended to the file. If the file exists and append is false, the file is overwritten. If the file exists and append is true, the data is appended to the file. Otherwise, a new file is created.
